meanings.definition: A container or device used to keep drinks or food cold.
meanings.sent1: I packed the coolers with ice and drinks for the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The coolers at the party were filled with refreshing beverages.
meanings.sent3: The coolers were like magical boxes that kept everything chilled.
meanings.sent4: The coolers whispered promises of frosty delights on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The coolers hummed softly, preserving the coolness within.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that cools.
meanings.sent1: The air conditioner was a great cooler during the heatwave.
meanings.sent2: The cooler of the group always stayed calm in tough situations.
meanings.sent3: The cooler in the office never seemed to break a sweat.
meanings.sent4: Her demeanor was like a cooler breeze on a sweltering day.
meanings.sent5: He was the cooler in the room, bringing a sense of peace to all.

meanings.sent1: The criminal was sent to the cooler for his crimes.
meanings.sent2: The escape artist found himself in the cooler once again.
meanings.sent3: Trying to break out of the cooler was a futile endeavor.
meanings.sent4: The cooler was a place of confinement and reflection for the inmates.
meanings.sent5: The walls of the cooler echoed with the sounds of locked doors.
